comment:
* Describes the properties of a Wifi display. *

* This object is immutable. *

* * @hide

methods.name: public String getDeviceAddress()
methods.comment: * Gets the MAC address of the Wifi display device.

methods.name: public String getDeviceName()
methods.comment: * Gets the name of the Wifi display device.

methods.name: public String getDeviceAlias()
methods.comment:
* Gets the user-specified alias of the Wifi display device, or null if none. *

* The alias should be used in the UI whenever available. It is the value * provided by the user when renaming the device. *

methods.name: public boolean isAvailable()
methods.comment: * Returns true if device is available, false otherwise.

methods.name: public boolean canConnect()
methods.comment: * Returns true if device can be connected to (not in use), false otherwise.

methods.name: public boolean isRemembered()
methods.comment: * Returns true if device has been remembered, false otherwise.

methods.name: public String getFriendlyDisplayName()
methods.comment:
* Gets the name to show in the UI.
     * Uses the device alias if available, otherwise uses the device name.

methods.name: public boolean equals(WifiDisplay other)
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the two displays have the same identity (address, name and alias).
     * This method does not compare the current status of the displays.

methods.name: public boolean hasSameAddress(WifiDisplay other)
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the other display is not null and has the same address as this one.
     * Can be used to perform identity comparisons on displays ignoring properties
     * that might change during a connection such as the name or alias.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
